programme.title: Winter Castle

programme.desc: Sophia accidentally comes away with the visiting pope's ring, then refuses to return it.

programme.desc: Sophia predicts a hurricane's path; Blanche and Rose participate in a telethon; Dorothy joins Stan in therapy.

programme.desc: Lorelai tries to break up with Rory's teacher, Max, on parent-teacher night, which leads to more problems for her daughter at school.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: After Lorelai encourages Sookie to ask out Jackson, she finds herself on a double date with Jackson's weird cousin; Rory goes on a double date as well.

programme.desc: Barbra Jean confesses that she has a big crush on her new marriage counselor, and she asks Reba to help her fire him.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba decides to pursue a career in real estate, and Brock reluctantly allows her to handle the sale of his condo.

programme.desc: Deprived of Van's attention, Cheyenne develops a relationship with the father of her daughter's play date.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Finger-pointing begins when Barbra Jean's new dog goes missing and a psychic tells her someone in the family is to blame.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba enters a beauty pageant for grandmothers, Barbra Jean becomes jealous and sets out to prove she is the true Grandma Hart.

programme.desc: Reba is thrilled when the city's hottest real estate agent wants to interview her for a job, until the woman shows up unannounced for a surprise meeting.

programme.desc: A real estate developer travels to a quaint seaside town to convince a charming local to sell his beachfront property. As she tries to figure out a way to make the deal work, the undeniable attraction between them continues to grow.

programme.desc: As spring blooms, rival house flippers find themselves renovating dual sides of a duplex. As they attempt to out-do each other every step of the way, the stakes of the renovation escalate and an old romance is rekindled.

programme.desc: Rory's boyfriend declares his love for her; Lorelai endures dinner with her parents and a blind date.

programme.desc: Brock volunteers to be a football coach and encourages Jake to try out for the team, so Reba persuades Van to train him for the tryouts.

programme.desc: Against her better judgment, Reba gives in to Cheyenne's pleas and hires the unemployed Van as her assistant, only to be surprised when he sells the house she has been trying to unload for weeks.

programme.desc: Reba takes it upon herself to keep Van sober when she suspects he has a drinking problem; Kyra and her band are invited to perform at a USO event for soldiers leaving for Iraq.

programme.desc: Cheyenne and Van must run interference at a client party after Reba takes a pill, by mistake, that will make her violently ill if she drinks alcohol.

programme.desc: When Barbra Jean signs Reba up for an online dating service, Reba winds up dating a mystery man and spending less time with the family.

programme.desc: A young woman starts to fall for a New York real estate developer who wants to buy her family's picturesque ranch in Montana.

programme.desc: A road trip through her granddaughter's past inspires Emily to make up for the material things Rory did not have growing up.
